# Portocervo Restaurant Website

This is a Next.js website for Restaurant Portocervo in Saarlouis, Germany.

## Design Guidelines
- Clean, elegant, minimalist white design
- Not too modern, classic and timeless
- Subtle details and animations with Framer Motion
- Use Google Fonts for custom typography
- Not too many images - keep it sophisticated

## Tech Stack
- Next.js with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion
- Google Fonts

## Features
- Restaurant information (address, phone, hours)
- Service options (outdoor seating, kids menu)
- Events and celebrations section
- Reservation form with clear disclaimer about confirmation requirement
